statements: SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_name, revenue FROM reports WHERE profit_margin > 0.2;
SELECT report_id, revenue, profit_margin FROM reports WHERE customer_satisfaction > 80;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE revenue < 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT report_name, profit_margin FROM reports WHERE revenue > 5000 ORDER BY profit_margin ASC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE profit_margin > 0.2 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_name, profit_margin, customer_satisfaction FROM reports WHERE customer_satisfaction > 80 ORDER BY customer_satisfaction ASC, revenue DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, revenue FROM reports WHERE profit_margin < 0.1 AND customer_satisfaction < 70 ORDER BY report_id;
SELECT DISTINCT report_name FROM reports WHERE revenue BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reports WHERE profit_margin < 0.05 OR customer_satisfaction < 50;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM revenue_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT report_name, revenue_amount FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT customer_name, feedback FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score = 5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports WHERE revenue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_name, revenue_amount FROM revenue_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' AND revenue_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY revenue_amount ASC
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score > 8 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT report_name, revenue_amount, report_date FROM revenue_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' AND revenue_amount < 5000 ORDER BY report_id ASC
SELECT customer_name, feedback FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE LENGTH(feedback) > 50 ORDER BY satisfaction_id DESC
SELECT * FROM revenue_report;
SELECT total_revenue, report_date FROM profit_margin_report ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, total_cost, profit_margin FROM profit_margin_report WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_satisfaction_report WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating ASC;
SELECT report_date, total_cost, total_revenue FROM profit_margin_report WHERE profit_margin < 0.2;
SELECT report_date, total_revenue FROM revenue_report ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM profit_margin_report WHERE profit_margin > 0.2 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT SUM(total_revenue) AS total_sales FROM revenue_report GROUP BY report_date HAVING total_sales > 50000;
SELECT report_date, total_cost, total_revenue, profit_margin FROM profit_margin_report WHERE total_cost < total_revenue ORDER BY profit_margin ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_report WHERE satisfaction_rating BETWEEN 7 AND 10 ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Revenue;
SELECT report_id, revenue_amount FROM ProfitMargins ORDER BY profit_margin DESC;
SELECT report_date, satisfaction_score FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_date FROM ManagementReports WHERE report_type = 'Revenue';
SELECT * FROM ProfitMargins WHERE profit_margin > 0.1 ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, revenue_amount, report_date FROM Revenue ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ProfitMargins WHERE profit_margin > 0.5 ORDER BY report_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, profit_margin, report_date FROM ProfitMargins WHERE profit_margin BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY report_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_score, survey_date FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score < 5 ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, report_title, report_type FROM ManagementReports WHERE report_type = 'Revenue' ORDER BY report_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RevenueReports;
SELECT report_date, revenue_amount FROM RevenueAndProfit ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(margin_value) AS highest_margin FROM ProfitMargins;
SELECT report_id, profit_amount FROM RevenueAndProfit WHERE profit_amount > 100000 ORDER BY report_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT satisfaction_id, satisfaction_score, feedback_text FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score <= 3;
SELECT * FROM RevenueReports WHERE revenue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_date, revenue_amount FROM RevenueReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT report_id, revenue_amount, report_date FROM RevenueReports WHERE report_date < '2022-08-01' AND revenue_amount < 5000
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC
SELECT satisfaction_score, feedback_text FROM CustomerSatisfaction WHERE satisfaction_score > 8 ORDER BY satisfaction_id
